title: SC EP:24 Bigfoot Roundtable with Coonbo
itunes:title: SC EP:24 Bigfoot Roundtable with Coonbo
description: We are broadcasting for a special roundtable discussion about Sasquatch. Coonbo and Anthropologist Erik Garcia return to the show. Coonbo will be sharing experiences he has had that we did not get to last time, including his recent expedition and what's happening now in his hotspot. We will also be sharing information that has been shared with us by a government employee we will call “Mr. Black.”

We will also be sharing information that has been shared with us by a government employee we will call “Mr. Black.”
